ygData.subject: Re: Newbie saga (Long...help?!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Peg, My sister and I read your post and it brought back memories LOL. I just found about about 6 months ago that you could find out information about items
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Peg,
My sister and I read your post and it brought back memories LOL. I
just found about about 6 months ago that you could find out
information about items that vendors sell by right-clicking on them.
Duhhhh. When I first started playing, I bought so many items, only to
find that I couldn't equip them - waste of money! But some nice
higher-level person told me how to do the "right-click" thing and
saved me a TON of time and money.

Another thing I found out the hard way was that you can't travel to
all places without getting killed. I traveled with my Erudite
Enchanter to Neriak to buy one of the Enchantment spells and a guard
hit me before I even zoned off the book good. Hang in there, you'll
get the hang of it all. Just takes some trial and error.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "armsfullofblessings"
<armsfullofblessings@a...> wrote:
>
> Hello all,
>
> My name is Peg, and I am glad to have found your e-loop. I'm one...
